analyzed: shes myur bri dang gang med dang // sgrub dang yang dag 'grub pa dang // dmigs pa rten dang bcas pa dang // mtha' dag pa dang yongs 'dzin dang // ro myang med dang khyad par ni //
translated: the absence of relishing, and the distinction

original: bcu drug bdag nyid shes bya ste //🔽gang gi lam ni gzhan dag las //
analyzed: bcu drug bdag nyid shes bya ste // gang gi lam ni gzhan dag las //
translated: are to be known as the sixteen aspects.

original: khyad du 'phags pa khyad par las //
analyzed: khyad du 'phags pa khyad par las //
translated: The path of insight is superior to other paths🔽by these sixteen aspects.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.🔽

original: de la dang po sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la dmigs pa'i mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma ni bzhi ste /
analyzed: de la dang po sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la dmigs pa'i mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma ni bzhi ste /
translated: The first is the path of seeing that focuses on the truth of suffering, which has four moments:

original: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa dang / sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang / sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa dang / sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang / sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'o //
translated: 1. the forbearance of the dharma knowing of suffering, 2. the dharma knowing of suffering, 3. the subsequent forbearance knowing of suffering, and 4. the subsequent knowing of suffering.

original: 'di rnams kyi khyad par bzhi ni go rims bzhin du bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid dang // mi mnyam pa nyid dang / gzhal du med pa nyid dang / bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi khyad par bzhi ni go rims bzhin du bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid dang // mi mnyam pa nyid dang / gzhal du med pa nyid dang / bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa nyid do //
translated: The four distinctions of these are, respectively, the inconceivability, the unequaled, the immeasurable, and the transcendence of enumeration.

original: tshad las yang dag par 'das pa ni gzhal du med pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshad las yang dag par 'das pa ni gzhal du med pa nyid do //
translated: The transcendence of measure is the immeasurable.

original: grangs las yang dag par 'das pa ni @136b bgrang ba las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: grangs las yang dag par 'das pa ni @136b bgrang ba las 'das pa'o //
translated: The transcendence of number is the transcendence of enumeration.

original: 'di dag ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di dag ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: These are stated in the passage beginning with “then.”

original: zab ces bya ba la sogs pa 'di ga las shes she na /
analyzed: zab ces bya ba la sogs pa 'di ga las shes she na /
translated: How is it known that this is profound, etc.?

original: bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, ...abides in great deeds.

original: gang gi phyir bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa de'i phyir zab pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa de'i phyir zab pa'o //
translated: Because it abides in great deeds, therefore it is profound.

original: kye ma'i sgra ni dga' pa'o ;
analyzed: kye ma'i sgra ni dga' pa'o ;
translated: The exclamation Oh! is joy.

original: / gang gis she na /
analyzed: / gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: de'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore it is said, inconceivable, etc.

original: gang gi phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i bya ba dang bcas pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bya ba ni lnga pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i bya ba dang bcas pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bya ba ni lnga pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: Because it has inconceivable, etc., deeds, unequalled deeds are the fifth distinction.

original: de de bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zhal gyis bzhes so //
analyzed: de de bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zhal gyis bzhes so //
translated: It is so, etc., is the acceptance.

original: don 'chad par bzhed nas rang nyid kyis rab 'byor ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas dris pa'o //
analyzed: don 'chad par bzhed nas rang nyid kyis rab 'byor ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas dris pa'o //
translated: Wishing to explain the meaning, he himself asks with How, Subhuti? etc.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis ni 'di'i bya ba rab tu ston par byed de /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis ni 'di'i bya ba rab tu ston par byed de /
translated: He explains with inconceivable, etc. The words Tathagata, etc., indicate its deeds.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ni chos ji lta na bzhin du gsungs pa'o /
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ni chos ji lta na bzhin du gsungs pa'o /
translated: The Thusness of the Tathagata is the teaching of the Dharma as it is.

original: sangs rgyas nyid ni rang nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid ni rang nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o //
translated: Buddhahood is the self-manifestation of perfect enlightenment.

original: rang byung nyid ni chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: rang byung nyid ni chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba nyid do //
translated: Self-arising is the mastery of all dharmas.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad la dag pa dang thogs pa med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad la dag pa dang thogs pa med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Omniscience is the pure and unobstructed knowledge of all aspects of all dharmas.

original: de ltar na zhes bya ba ni de lta bus so //
analyzed: de ltar na zhes bya ba ni de lta bus so //
translated: Thus means in this way.

original: ji ltar 'di bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'di bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is this inconceivable activity?

original: 'di ni sems kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di ni sems kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says this is not within the range of thought, etc.,

original: 'di ni sems las zhes bya ba la sogs pa yul gang la sems pa de ni nges par sems pa la sogs pa'i yul yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni sems las zhes bya ba la sogs pa yul gang la sems pa de ni nges par sems pa la sogs pa'i yul yin no //
translated: where this is not within the range of thought and so on refers to the object of thought, etc.

original: 'di ni sems kyis bsam par mi nus so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis sems la rag las pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir sems smos kyi /
analyzed: 'di ni sems kyis bsam par mi nus so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis sems la rag las pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir sems smos kyi /
translated: He mentions thought with the words this is not within the range of thought in order to show that it is dependent on thought,

original: yang gzhan rnam par bcad pa bsgrub pa yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yang gzhan rnam par bcad pa bsgrub pa yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, the existence of the proof of the exclusion of other is not so.

original: 'di la sems sam zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems ni rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la sems sam zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems ni rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Here, “mind” and so on. Mind is consciousness.

original: de ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: It is twofold:

original: mngon sum dang cig shos so //
analyzed: mngon sum dang cig shos so //
translated: direct perception and inference.

original: de la 'jig rten gyi mngon sum ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la mi 'jug gi cig shos ni 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la 'jig rten gyi mngon sum ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la mi 'jug gi cig shos ni 'gyur ro //
translated: Among them, the direct perception of the world does not engage the Tathāgata, but the other does.

original: de yang de'i rang gi ngo bo mi 'dzin te /
analyzed: de yang de'i rang gi ngo bo mi 'dzin te /
translated: And that does not apprehend his own nature.

original: gang yang sems kyi yul la sems pa la sogs pa dang / mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems kyis bsam pa 'am /
analyzed: gang yang sems kyi yul la sems pa la sogs pa dang / mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems kyis bsam pa 'am /
translated: Also, the mind that thinks about the object of the mind and so on, or the thought of the mind that is concomitant,

original: gzhal bar mi nus so //🔽yang bsam pa @137a * //
analyzed: gzhal bar mi nus so // yang bsam pa @137a * //
translated: cannot be measured.

original: zhes smos pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: zhes smos pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Moreover, the statement “thought” and so on. Why is that?

original: gang bsam par yang mi nus pa de ni shin tu yang gzhal bar mi nus so /
analyzed: gang bsam par yang mi nus pa de ni shin tu yang gzhal bar mi nus so /
translated: That which cannot be thought cannot be measured at all.

original: zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is taught.

original: de la gzhal du med pa la sogs pas dris pa la yang lan de bzhin du shas par bya'o //
analyzed: de la gzhal du med pa la sogs pas dris pa la yang lan de bzhin du shas par bya'o //
translated: In response to the questions about the immeasurable and so on, the answer should be understood in the same way.

original: de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyi mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma bstan nas /
analyzed: de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyi mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma bstan nas /
translated: Because it is the inconceivable result, the instant of the path of seeing of the inconceivable itself is taught.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir yang de brjod par bya ba la /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir yang de brjod par bya ba la /
translated: And because it is the inconceivable object, it is expressed.

original: gnas brtan rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pas skabs te rab tu ston to /
analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pas skabs te rab tu ston to /
translated: The chapter is taught by the words “the elder Subhūti.”

original: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshad med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa re re yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshad med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa re re yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Subhūti, it is because all dharmas are immeasurable” means that each one, such as form and feeling, is immeasurable.

original: gzhan dun bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa tha mi dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan dun bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa tha mi dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, the probandum and the proof would not be different.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gtan tshigs so //
translated: “Because it is equal to space” is a reason for the equality of the unequal.

original: de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs su bstan pa'i phyir rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs su bstan pa'i phyir rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: In order to demonstrate that very [nature] as the reason of inconceivability, etc., it is said: Subhūti, what do you think?

original: 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pas ni yang gzhan chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pas ni yang gzhan chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid sgrub par byed do //
translated: These, etc. establishes the inconceivability of all dharmas again.

original: 'di dag ces bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag go //
analyzed: 'di dag ces bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag go //
translated: These refers to these forms, etc.

original: 'dis kyang zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid kyis kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'dis kyang zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid kyis kyang ngo //
translated: By this refers to the Tathagata's dharmata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyang ma grub pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyang ma grub pa yin no zhe na /
translated: The Tathagata's inconceivable dharmata is also not established.

original: chos 'di dag ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
analyzed: chos 'di dag ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
translated: These dharmas, etc. is stated.

original: de ni shes mod kyi ji ltar grub pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ni shes mod kyi ji ltar grub pa yin zhe na /
translated: That is known, but how is it established?

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Inconceivable, immeasurable, etc. is stated.

original: rnam par shes par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni tshad mas grub pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni tshad mas grub pa'o //
translated: Having become consciousness means established by valid cognition.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa de gzhin du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa de gzhin du'o //
translated: Thus means just as it is inconceivable and immeasurable.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs bstan gyi dpag tu med pa la sogs pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs ni ma bstan to zhe na /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs bstan gyi dpag tu med pa la sogs pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs ni ma bstan to zhe na /
translated: If it is asked why the reason for inconceivability and immeasurability is taught, but the reason for being immeasurable, etc., is not taught,

original: dpag tu med pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: dpag tu med pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: it is because immeasurable, etc., are taught.

original: 'di nyid sgras bstan pa tsam nyid yin gyi tshad ma ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'di nyid sgras bstan pa tsam nyid yin gyi tshad ma ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is asked whether this is merely taught by words and not by valid knowledge,

original: nam mkha' mi mnyam pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: nam mkha' mi mnyam pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: it is because space is taught to be unequal, etc.

original: 'di ltar dgongs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar dgongs te /
translated: This is the intention.

original: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is the essence of the extremely pure dharmadhatu,

original: de @137b bzhin gshegs pa'i chos thams cad ni nam mkha' lta bu'o //
analyzed: de @137b bzhin gshegs pa'i chos thams cad ni nam mkha' lta bu'o //
translated: all dharmas of the tathagatas are like space.

original: de bas na nam mkha' lta bur mnyam pa med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / dpag tu med pas chos 'di dag ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / grangs med pa dang / dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na nam mkha' lta bur mnyam pa med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / dpag tu med pas chos 'di dag ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / grangs med pa dang / dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: Thus, these phenomena are equal to the unequaled, to the countless, and to the immeasurable.

original: de bzhin du nam mkha' gzhal du med pa dang / mi 'phrad pa zhes bya ba ni lan gyi rigs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du nam mkha' gzhal du med pa dang / mi 'phrad pa zhes bya ba ni lan gyi rigs pa'o //
translated: Similarly, the argument of the reply is that space is immeasurable, and that it is not something that comes into contact.

original: 'dis 'di mnyam pa zhes bya ba gnyis nye ba na yod na ni /
analyzed: 'dis 'di mnyam pa zhes bya ba gnyis nye ba na yod na ni /
translated: Here, the word equal is used in the sense of near.

original: yod par 'gyur na nye ba na yod pa de yang med de de bas ni mi mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: yod par 'gyur na nye ba na yod pa de yang med de de bas ni mi mnyam pa'o //
translated: If it were to exist, it would be near, but that nearness does not exist, and therefore it is unequal.

original: rab 'byor de lta bas ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mjug bsdu ba'i phyir nam mkha' bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor de lta bas ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mjug bsdu ba'i phyir nam mkha' bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Subhuti, therefore, etc. is said to conclude. The words space is inconceivable, etc. are said to conclude.

original: 'di la chos bstan pa na gang dang gang gis sems can gyi don du gyur ba de bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di la chos bstan pa na gang dang gang gis sems can gyi don du gyur ba de bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Here, in order to teach the Dharma, whatever is for the benefit of sentient beings, that is taught.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, the Bhagavan, etc. is said.

original: zag pa ni nyon mongs pa rnams so //
analyzed: zag pa ni nyon mongs pa rnams so //
translated: Defilements are the afflictions.

original: de dag las sems rnam par grol ba ni grol ba'o //
analyzed: de dag las sems rnam par grol ba ni grol ba'o //
translated: Liberation is the liberation of mind from them.

original: len pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sa bon spangs pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: len pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sa bon spangs pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Non-appropriation is due to the abandonment of the seeds of the afflictions.

original: chos rnams la zhes bya ba ni bden pa bzhi po dag la'o //
analyzed: chos rnams la zhes bya ba ni bden pa bzhi po dag la'o //
translated: With regard to the dharmas means with regard to the four noble truths.

original: chos kyang yin la lam yang yin pa dang / mig kyang yin zhing mthong ba yang yin pa'i phyir chos kyi mig 'di ni mthong pa'i lam mo //
analyzed: chos kyang yin la lam yang yin pa dang / mig kyang yin zhing mthong ba yang yin pa'i phyir chos kyi mig 'di ni mthong pa'i lam mo //
translated: This dharma-eye is the path of seeing, because it is both a dharma and a path, and it is both an eye and seeing.

original: de'i bzod pa'i skad cig la ni rdul med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bzod pa'i skad cig la ni rdul med pa'o //
translated: In the moment of its acceptance, it is dust-free.

original: shes pa'i skad cig la ni dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes pa'i skad cig la ni dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: In the moment of its knowledge, it is pure and free from defilements.

original: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad la zag pa med par shes pa ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad la zag pa med par shes pa ni bzod pa'o //
translated: The acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas is the acceptance of the knowledge that all dharmas are without outflows.

original: de thob par gyur pa ni sa brgyad ste /
analyzed: de thob par gyur pa ni sa brgyad ste /
translated: The attainment of that is the eighth stage.

original: 'dis bya ba chen po byas pa ni sngar bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis bya ba chen po byas pa ni sngar bstan to //
translated: The great deed done by this is as previously explained.

original: yang khyad par bstan par bya ba la de'i phyir /
analyzed: yang khyad par bstan par bya ba la de'i phyir /
translated: Again, it is to be taught as distinguished, and therefore:

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis zhes bya ba'i bar gyis skabs ston par byed do //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis zhes bya ba'i bar gyis skabs ston par byed do //
translated: Then, the passage beginning with “Thereupon the venerable Subhūti” shows the context.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni /
translated: Then, the Blessed One said:

original: 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs pa la /
analyzed: 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs pa la /
translated: “This is called omniscience,” etc.

original: 'di ni yang dag par ldan no zhes bya ba ni de dang rab tu 'brel pa'o ;
analyzed: 'di ni yang dag par ldan no zhes bya ba ni de dang rab tu 'brel pa'o ;
translated: “This is endowed” means it is connected with that.

original: /'di lta ste dper na zhes bya ba ni dpe'o //
analyzed: /'di lta ste dper na zhes bya ba ni dpe'o //
translated: “For example” is the example.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni des mtshon par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni des mtshon par byed pa'o //
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this” shows it is illustrated by that.

original: rnam grangs 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug sdud pa'o //
analyzed: rnam grangs 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug sdud pa'o //
translated: “By this method,” etc. is the conclusion.

original: 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis sdug bsngal gyi skad cig ma bzhi'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis sdug bsngal gyi skad cig ma bzhi'o //
translated: This is the four moments of suffering with the distinctions of inconceivability, etc.

original: gzugs yongs @138a * //
analyzed: gzugs yongs @138a * //
translated: Form is fully understood.

original: su mi gzung zhing mngon par ma chags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar gnas pa zhes 'og ma dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: su mi gzung zhing mngon par ma chags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar gnas pa zhes 'og ma dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should not grasp at anything, should not be attached to anything and so on is to be connected with the perfection of wisdom is present below.

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zhus pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zhus pa'o //
translated: The question beginning Bhagavan, how is it? and so on.

original: de ji snyam du sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no //🔽gang la yongs su 'dzin pa 'am /
analyzed: de ji snyam du sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no // gang la yongs su 'dzin pa 'am /
translated: The answer beginning What do you think, Subhūti? and so on.

original: mngon par chag bar byed pa zhes bya ba la yongs su 'dzin pa ni yod par shes pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par chag bar byed pa zhes bya ba la yongs su 'dzin pa ni yod par shes pa'o //
translated: What is there to grasp or to be attached to? Grasping is the cognition of existence.

original: mngon par chags pa ni dngos por shes pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par chags pa ni dngos por shes pa'o //
translated: Attachment is the cognition of entities.

original: de ni gnyis kyi ngo bo stan pa ni dgra bcom pa nyid ces gsungs te /
analyzed: de ni gnyis kyi ngo bo stan pa ni dgra bcom pa nyid ces gsungs te /
translated: That is taught to be the nature of the two, arhatship.

original: de ltar dgra bcom pa nyid ce na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med pa dag gis yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar dgra bcom pa nyid ce na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med pa dag gis yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, because of the absence of grasping and attachment to all phenomena such as omniscience and so on, it is arhatship.

original: 'di ni 'phags pa kun sdud pa'i khyad par gyis kun 'byung skad cig ma dang po'o //🔽rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di dag gis ni skal pa med pa rnams bstan to //
analyzed: 'di ni 'phags pa kun sdud pa'i khyad par gyis kun 'byung skad cig ma dang po'o // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di dag gis ni skal pa med pa rnams bstan to //
translated: This is the first moment of the origin of the noble ones.🔽Subhūti said Blessed One and so on. By this, he shows those who are not fortunate.

original: 'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni skal ba dang ldan par bstan to //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni skal ba dang ldan par bstan to //
translated: However, Blessed One, those who are fortunate and so on shows those who are fortunate.

original: rgyu phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni rigs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni rigs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The perfection of causes means possessing the lineage.

original: sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis zhes bya ba ni phan pa'i bsod nams byas pa'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis zhes bya ba ni phan pa'i bsod nams byas pa'o //
translated: Having served the Victorious Ones in the past means having created beneficial merit.

original: yun ring po ni dus yun ring po'o ;
analyzed: yun ring po ni dus yun ring po'o ;
translated: For a long time means for a long period of time.

original: / bskrun pa ni bsags pa'o //
analyzed: / bskrun pa ni bsags pa'o //
translated: Accumulated means collected.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba ni bcom ldan 'das yum thob pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba ni bcom ldan 'das yum thob pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Roots of virtue refers to attaining the Bhagavat's mother and so on.

original: gang gis de dag bstan pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang gis de dag bstan pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Those who teach that are called that.

original: 'di nyid de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di nyid de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: This is precisely what is stated from Then the Blessed One said and so on.

original: ci'i phyir zab ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zab ce na /
translated: Why is it profound?

original: de'i phyir blta dka' ba zhes gsungs te ;
analyzed: de'i phyir blta dka' ba zhes gsungs te ;
translated: Therefore, it is stated as difficult to see.

original: blta dka' bas bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir 'di yang dag pa'i lta ba'o //
analyzed: blta dka' bas bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir 'di yang dag pa'i lta ba'o //
translated: This is the right view, because it is not to be practiced, since it is difficult to see.

original: rtogs par dka' ba ni shes par dka' ba'i phyir mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs par dka' ba ni shes par dka' ba'i phyir mi shes pa'o //
translated: It is difficult to understand, because it is difficult to know.

original: de lta mod kyi gang gi phyir rgyu dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i yon tan yod na mkhas pa 'di nyid la mos par 'gyur ti /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi gang gi phyir rgyu dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i yon tan yod na mkhas pa 'di nyid la mos par 'gyur ti /
translated: However, if one has the qualities of being endowed with the cause, etc., one will have faith in this very knowledge of the wise.

original: de ni mkhas pas rig par bya ba nyid kyi khyad par gyis kun 'byung gi skad cig ma gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de ni mkhas pas rig par bya ba nyid kyi khyad par gyis kun 'byung gi skad cig ma gnyis pa'o //
translated: This is the second moment of origination, distinguished by being the very object of knowledge of the wise.

original: bcom ldan 'das gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dad pas rjes su 'brang ba ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dag go //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dad pas rjes su 'brang ba ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dag go //
translated: The Blessed One said, If, Subhūti, a faithful son or daughter of good family were to think...

original: de'i sa ni sa'o //
analyzed: de'i sa ni sa'o //
translated: The stage of that is the stage of the faithful son or daughter of good family.

original: bskal pa bas lhag pa dang bcas pa ni bskal pa'i lhag ma'o //
analyzed: bskal pa bas lhag pa dang bcas pa ni bskal pa'i lhag ma'o //
translated: Having a remainder of eons means having a remainder of eons.

original: bzod pa ni zag @138b pa med pa'i shes rab po //
analyzed: bzod pa ni zag @138b pa med pa'i shes rab po //
translated: Patience is uncontaminated wisdom.

original: sred pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'o //
translated: Craving is strong desire.

original: tshol ba ni de ji ltar yod ces pa'o //
analyzed: tshol ba ni de ji ltar yod ces pa'o //
translated: Seeking is thinking, 'How is it?'

original: sems pa ni rigs pa rnam pa bzhis so //🔽'jal ba ni yongs su gcod pa'o //🔽nye bar rtog pa ni so sor rtog pa'o //🔽nye bar sems pa ni mang du byed pa'o //🔽'di nyid de dag pas mchog tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i shes pa ste /
analyzed: sems pa ni rigs pa rnam pa bzhis so // 'jal ba ni yongs su gcod pa'o // nye bar rtog pa ni so sor rtog pa'o // nye bar sems pa ni mang du byed pa'o // 'di nyid de dag pas mchog tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i shes pa ste /
translated: The mind that is the measure is the mind that is the ascertainment.

original: shes pa ni shes pa'o //🔽thun mong ma yin pa yang de'i khyad par nyid kyi phyir dang / shes pa ni mthong ba nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: shes pa ni shes pa'o // thun mong ma yin pa yang de'i khyad par nyid kyi phyir dang / shes pa ni mthong ba nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: The mind that is the investigation is the mind that is the discernment.🔽The mind that is the reflection is the mind that is the repetition.

original: de ni thun mong ma yin pa'i shes pa'o //
analyzed: de ni thun mong ma yin pa'i shes pa'o //
translated: This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.

original: de'i dngos po ni thun mong ma yin pa'i shes pa'i dngos po nyid de /
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni thun mong ma yin pa'i shes pa'i dngos po nyid de /
translated: This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection.

original: 'di ni thun mong ma yin pa'i shes pa'i khyad par gyis skad cig ma gsum pa'o //🔽de skad ces gsol pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: 'di ni thun mong ma yin pa'i shes pa'i khyad par gyis skad cig ma gsum pa'o //🔽de skad ces gsol pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: This is the mind that is the reflection.🔽This is the mind that is the reflection

original: lhag par spyod pa de dag gis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa la des ni zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dam pa des so //🔽rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces myur bar mya ngan las 'da' ba la re bar bya zhes bya ba ni thob par bya'o //🔽'di ni myur bar mngon par shes pa nyid kyi khyad par gyis kun 'byung gi skad cig ma bzhi pa'o //🔽de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /🔽pha rol tu phyin pa chen po zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis so ;
analyzed: lhag par spyod pa de dag gis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa la des ni zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dam pa des so // rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces myur bar mya ngan las 'da' ba la re bar bya zhes bya ba ni thob par bya'o // 'di ni myur bar mngon par shes pa nyid kyi khyad par gyis kun 'byung gi skad cig ma bzhi pa'o // de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la / pha rol tu phyin pa chen po zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis so ;
translated: Especially, it is not by those practices.

original: /'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir zhes gsol nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽me ring ba zhig tu phyin nas bya ba ni rkang pa gnyis kho nas so //🔽mi snang bar gyur te zhes bya ba ni nub par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: /'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir zhes gsol nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽me ring ba zhig tu phyin nas bya ba ni rkang pa gnyis kho nas so //🔽mi snang bar gyur te zhes bya ba ni nub par gyur pa ste /
