original: nam mkha' kho nar snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' kho nar snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they appear only in space.

original: 'dod ba na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de dag rang rang gi gnas su phyin pa bstan te /
analyzed: 'dod ba na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de dag rang rang gi gnas su phyin pa bstan te /
translated: The sons of gods who live in the desire realm, etc. shows that they each went to their own abode.

original: de la 'dis ni ji ltar de dag nam mkha' la mi snang zhing rang rang gi gnas su phyin pa ni nam mkha' la bri pa 'am gang ba med pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi snang ba ni theg pa mchog dang🔽dman pa'i byang chub thob pa ni bri ba 'am /
analyzed: de la 'dis ni ji ltar de dag nam mkha' la mi snang zhing rang rang gi gnas su phyin pa ni nam mkha' la bri pa 'am gang ba med pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi snang ba ni theg pa mchog dang dman pa'i byang chub thob pa ni bri ba 'am /
translated: Here, just as they do not appear in space and go to their own abodes, so the nonappearance of the perfection of wisdom is the nondepletion of the supreme vehicle and

original: gang ba med pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang ba med pa nyid do //
translated: the attainment of the lesser and greater enlightenments is the nonfilling of the supreme vehicle.

original: 'di ni bri ba dang gang ba med pa'i khyad par gyis te 'gog pa'i skad cig ma dang po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bri ba dang gang ba med pa'i khyad par gyis te 'gog pa'i skad cig ma dang po'o //
translated: This is the first moment of cessation, distinguished by nondepletion and nonfilling.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i le'u ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i le'u ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u'o //
translated: The chapter on the inconceivable, etc. is the chapter on the inconceivable.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel /
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel /
translated: Commentary on the Perfection of Wisdom in Eight Thousand Lines

original: slob dpon rin chen @139a * //
analyzed: slob dpon rin chen @139a * //
translated: Master Ratnākaraśānti

original: 'byung gnas zhi bas rnam par sbyar pa snying po mchog ces bya ba las le'u gsum pa'i /
analyzed: 'byung gnas zhi bas rnam par sbyar pa snying po mchog ces bya ba las le'u gsum pa'i /
translated: The third chapter of the Supreme Essence Tantra called the Source of Peace.

original: // / de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: // / de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: Then the Blessed One said this to Vajrapāṇi and the others,🔽and so on up to

original: yon tan 'di dag ldan par rig par bya ste zhes bya ba gsungs pa la /
analyzed: yon tan 'di dag ldan par rig par bya ste zhes bya ba gsungs pa la /
translated: one should know that they have these qualities.

original: thos ma thag ni thos par 'gyur pa'o ;
analyzed: thos ma thag ni thos par 'gyur pa'o ;
translated: As soon as they hear it, they hear it.

original: / mos pa ni mos par 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: / mos pa ni mos par 'gyur pa'o //
translated: They aspire to it, they aspire to it.

original: zhum par mi 'gyur ba ni lam ma yin pa la mi spro ba'o //
analyzed: zhum par mi 'gyur ba ni lam ma yin pa la mi spro ba'o //
translated: They do not become discouraged, they do not delight in the wrong path.

original: kun du zhum par mi 'gyur ba ni spro ba med pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: kun du zhum par mi 'gyur ba ni spro ba med pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: They do not become completely discouraged, they are not without delight.

original: rnam par gnas par mi 'gyur ba ni ldog par mi 'gyur ba'o //🔽rmongs pa ni nges pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par gnas par mi 'gyur ba ni ldog par mi 'gyur ba'o // rmongs pa ni nges pa med pa'o //
translated: They do not become fixed, they do not turn back.🔽They are not confused, they are not uncertain.

original: the tshom ni yid gnyis so //🔽som nyi ni phyin ci log go //
analyzed: the tshom ni yid gnyis so // som nyi ni phyin ci log go //
translated: They are not doubtful, they are not mistaken.

original: 'di dag med pa'i phyir rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / the tshom du mi 'gyur ba dang / som nyi za bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'di dag med pa'i phyir rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / the tshom du mi 'gyur ba dang / som nyi za bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Because these do not exist, they do not become confused, they do not become doubtful, they do not become uncertain.

original: mngon par dga' ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par dga' ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'o //
translated: Great delight means great desire.

original: mi spong ba ni mi 'dor ba'o //
analyzed: mi spong ba ni mi 'dor ba'o //
translated: Not abandoning means not rejecting.

original: phyir phyogs pa ni rgyab kyis bltas pa'o //
analyzed: phyir phyogs pa ni rgyab kyis bltas pa'o //
translated: Turning away means turning one's back.

original: 'dod pa'i phyir mos pa skyed par 'gyur ba ni ji ltar mos par rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i phyir mos pa skyed par 'gyur ba ni ji ltar mos par rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to desire, one generates aspiration means in accordance with one's aspiration, one engages in practice.

original: rjes su 'brang zhing zhes bya ba ni rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'brang zhing zhes bya ba ni rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: Following means instruction.

original: phyi bzhin 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni nges par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: phyi bzhin 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni nges par bstan pa'o //
translated: Following after means definite instruction.

original: be'u gzhon nu ni btsas ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: be'u gzhon nu ni btsas ma thag pa'o //
translated: Young calf means one just born.

original: lus la thogs pa ni snying ga'i phyogs su thogs pa'o //
analyzed: lus la thogs pa ni snying ga'i phyogs su thogs pa'o //
translated: Attached to the body means attached to the region of the heart.

original: btsams pa zhes bya ba ni dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: btsams pa zhes bya ba ni dbang du byas pa'o //
translated: Subjugated means brought under control.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rigs rnam pa gsum gyi sgrub pa 'di ni rjes su sgrub pa'i khyad par du 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rigs rnam pa gsum gyi sgrub pa 'di ni rjes su sgrub pa'i khyad par du 'grub pa yin no //
translated: Thus, this practice of the three types of bodhisattva potential is accomplished through the distinctive practice of accomplishment.

original: 'di ni sgrub pa'i khyad par gyis te 'gog pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sgrub pa'i khyad par gyis te 'gog pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa'o //
translated: This is the second moment of cessation through the distinctive practice.

original: yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang gis zhes bya ba nas gcig tu re bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa la yongs su ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yongs su sgra ni yang dag pa'i don to //
analyzed: yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang gis zhes bya ba nas gcig tu re bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa la yongs su ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yongs su sgra ni yang dag pa'i don to //
translated: Unmixed with the vehicles of the Sravakas and Pratyekabuddhas means: the word parinirmita has the meaning of samyak.

original: g-yengs pa zhes bya ba ni 'phro ba'o //
analyzed: g-yengs pa zhes bya ba ni 'phro ba'o //
translated: Distracted means: scattered.

original: ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du zhes bya ba ni dge sbyong gi mgo 'dra ba'i rtsva lta bu'o //
analyzed: ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du zhes bya ba ni dge sbyong gi mgo 'dra ba'i rtsva lta bu'o //
translated: Like a cotton tuft means: like a blade of grass with a head like a monk.

original: 'dzin pa ni shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa ni shes pa'o //
translated: To grasp means: to know.

original: 'jug pa ni rjes su sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa ni rjes su sgrub pa'o //
translated: To enter into means: to accomplish.

original: 'khor ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
translated: With a retinue means: with the retinue of the five perfections.

original: de dag gi rjes su zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag gi rjes su zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The word anugata has the meaning of anugata.

original: gang 'di nyid brjod pa ni snga ma ni sangs rgyas kyis sa kho nar rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang 'di nyid brjod pa ni snga ma ni sangs rgyas kyis sa kho nar rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: What is said here is that the former is realized only on the Buddha-stage.

original: sa gsum yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu nyid yin @139b pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sa gsum yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu nyid yin @139b pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is the fruit of the accomplishment of the three stages.

original: 'di ni yang dag par sgrub pa'i khyad par gyis te 'gog pa'i skad cig ma gsum pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni yang dag par sgrub pa'i khyad par gyis te 'gog pa'i skad cig ma gsum pa'o //
translated: This is the third moment of cessation, by the special practice.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na zhes bya ba nas gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa la mi 'jug pa shin tu mi 'ju pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na zhes bya ba nas gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa la mi 'jug pa shin tu mi 'ju pa'o //
translated: Subhuti, it is like this, up to he will stand, means that he will not enter, and will not be digested.

original: dus byed par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dus byed par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: He will die, means he will pass away.

original: bde ba zhes bya ba'i sgra ni tshig gi phrad de bde ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bde ba zhes bya ba'i sgra ni tshig gi phrad de bde ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The word happiness is a verbal prefix, meaning happiness.

original: bar chad med pa ni bgegs kyi dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: bar chad med pa ni bgegs kyi dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Without obstruction means without the thing of an obstacle.

original: ma smas ma zhes bya ba ni dum bur ma gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ma smas ma zhes bya ba ni dum bur ma gyur pa'o //
translated: Not injured, not cut up, means not become in pieces.

original: ma smad pa ni 'tshe ba'i dngos po gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma smad pa ni 'tshe ba'i dngos po gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Not despised, means because there is no other thing of harm.

original: yid la byed pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma 'jus pa'o ;
analyzed: yid la byed pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma 'jus pa'o ;
translated: Because of the absence of mental activity, he does not enter the perfection of wisdom.

original: / nyam nga ba'i lam gyi dbus ni bar ma do'o //
analyzed: / nyam nga ba'i lam gyi dbus ni bar ma do'o //
translated: The middle of the dangerous path is the intermediate state.

original: rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba ni yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba ni yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: He will be destroyed, means he will be endowed.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma la dad pa la sogs pa yod pa zhes bya ba la brtson ba mi 'dor ba yod pa ni mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i khur mi 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma la dad pa la sogs pa yod pa zhes bya ba la brtson ba mi 'dor ba yod pa ni mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i khur mi 'dod pa'o //
translated: The phrase those who have faith in the Lord and so on refers to those who do not abandon the effort to take up the burden of perfect enlightenment.

original: de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar 'jug par byed pa yod na /
analyzed: de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar 'jug par byed pa yod na /
translated: If they also engage in the perfection of wisdom in this way,

original: de dag dad pa yod pa nas brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i bar 'dis rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro //🔽'di ni dmigs pa'i khyad par gyis te /
analyzed: de dag dad pa yod pa nas brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i bar 'dis rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro // 'di ni dmigs pa'i khyad par gyis te /
translated: they will attain perfect enlightenment and abide in omniscience.

original: 'gog pa'i skad cig ma bzhi pa'o //🔽rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i skad cig ma bzhi pa'o // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na zhes bya ba nas /
translated: This is the fourth moment of cessation, distinguished by its objective support.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa la /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa la /
translated: The passage from Subhuti, it is thus up to the level of a Solitary Realizer is stated in terms of the objective support.

original: gzhi dang lhan cig pa ni rten no //
analyzed: gzhi dang lhan cig pa ni rten no //
translated: The phrase along with the basis refers to the support.

original: thabs la mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongs su bzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongs su bzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase skill in means refers to the five perfections that are embraced.

original: bum pa legs par so btang ba lta bu ni sems so //
analyzed: bum pa legs par so btang ba lta bu ni sems so //
translated: The mind is like a well-sharpened vase.

original: chu lta bu ni dad pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: chu lta bu ni dad pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Faith, etc. are like water.

original: khyer ba ni de bzhin du 'jig par mi 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyer ba ni de bzhin du 'jig par mi 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: The one who is thus is not lost, and abides in the knowledge of all modes.

original: 'di ni rten dang bcas pa'i khyad par gyis te lam gyi skad cig ma dang po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rten dang bcas pa'i khyad par gyis te lam gyi skad cig ma dang po'o //
translated: This is the difference in the support, and is the first moment of the Path.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu shes rab 'chal pa zhes bya ba nas tang sangs rgyas kyis sar mi sgrub po zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa la /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu shes rab 'chal pa zhes bya ba nas tang sangs rgyas kyis sar mi sgrub po zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa la /
translated: Subhuti, it is just as if a foolish man, etc. to: he does not reach the level of a Buddha.

original: legs par zhes bya ba ni ma lus par bshad pa ste bya ba thams cad byas pa'o //
analyzed: legs par zhes bya ba ni ma lus par bshad pa ste bya ba thams cad byas pa'o //
translated: Well-equipped means fully equipped, all his duties fulfilled.

original: mthun pa'i rlung ni rjes su mthun pa'i rlung ngo //
analyzed: mthun pa'i rlung ni rjes su mthun pa'i rlung ngo //
translated: A favorable wind is a wind that is favorable.

original: gru ni gru nyid do //
analyzed: gru ni gru nyid do //
translated: A ship is a ship.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa ma lus pa dag yin te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa ma lus pa dag yin te /
translated: The perfection of wisdom and skill in means are the equipment.

original: 'di ni mtha' dag gi khyad par gyis te /
analyzed: 'di ni mtha' dag gi khyad par gyis te /
translated: This is the difference in totality.

original: lam gyi skad cig ma @140a * //
analyzed: lam gyi skad cig ma @140a * //
translated: 2. the moment of the path.

original: gnyis so // rab 'byor 'di lta ste zhes bya ba nas le'u rdzogs kyi bar du gsungs pa la /
analyzed: gnyis so // rab 'byor 'di lta ste zhes bya ba nas le'u rdzogs kyi bar du gsungs pa la /
translated: The chapter is called “The Inconceivable.”

original: 'di la nyi shu dang bcas pa'i lo brgya'i tshad yod pa de ni lo brgya nyi shu lon pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la nyi shu dang bcas pa'i lo brgya'i tshad yod pa de ni lo brgya nyi shu lon pa'o //
translated: The measure of a hundred years in this world is the life span of twenty of those in the heaven of the Thirty-­Three.

original: mang po nyid la brgya ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: mang po nyid la brgya ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isn’t “hundred” a numeral?

original: skye gnas zhes bya ba ni btsas nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: skye gnas zhes bya ba ni btsas nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Birth” means “having been born.”

original: skyis nas lo 'di tsam mo zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to //
analyzed: skyis nas lo 'di tsam mo zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to //
translated: “This many years” means “in summary.”

original: gzhan gyis legs par bsten cing zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis legs par bsten cing zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'o //
translated: “Well-­cared for by others” means “well-­cared for by others.”

original: khri ni khri'o //
analyzed: khri ni khri'o //
translated: “A throne” means “a throne.”

original: 'gro ba ni 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba ni 'gro ba'o //
translated: “To go” means “to go.”

original: bcom pa ni zad pa'o //
analyzed: bcom pa ni zad pa'o //
translated: “To be destroyed” means “to be exhausted.”

original: gang du zhes bya ba ni phyogs gang du'o //
analyzed: gang du zhes bya ba ni phyogs gang du'o //
translated: “Where” means “in which direction.”

original: 'gro bar bya ba ni ci tsam ring bar ro //
analyzed: 'gro bar bya ba ni ci tsam ring bar ro //
translated: “To go” means “how far.”

original: gnas der zhes bya ba ni grong khyer der ro //
analyzed: gnas der zhes bya ba ni grong khyer der ro //
translated: “To that place” means “to that city.”

original: lhag ma ni rtogs sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni rtogs sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: 'di ni yongs su 'dzin pa'i khyad par gyis te lam gyi skad cig ma gsum pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni yongs su 'dzin pa'i khyad par gyis te lam gyi skad cig ma gsum pa'o //
translated: This is the third moment of the path, by the distinction of complete acceptance.

original: dpe ni dpe nyid de rgya mtsho dang gru las sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dpe ni dpe nyid de rgya mtsho dang gru las sogs pa'o //
translated: The example is just the example, the ocean, the ship, and so on.

original: de'i don gyi le'u ni dpe'i le'u'o //
analyzed: de'i don gyi le'u ni dpe'i le'u'o //
translated: The chapter on that meaning is the Chapter on the Example.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel /
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel /
translated: Noble Perfection of Wisdom in Eight Thousand Lines Commentary

original: slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas rnam par sbyar ba snying po mchog ces bya ba las le'u bcu bzhi ba'o /
analyzed: slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas rnam par sbyar ba snying po mchog ces bya ba las le'u bcu bzhi ba'o /
translated: The master Ratnākaraśānti's Ornament of the Essence, called The Supreme, Chapter Fourteen

original: // / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa b nas 'gro ba lnga'i sems can rnams la gsungs so //
analyzed: // / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa b nas 'gro ba lnga'i sems can rnams la gsungs so //
translated: Then the Blessed One said to the venerable Subhūti and so on, up to for the sake of the sentient beings of the five destinies.

original: 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang gang zhig yin zhe ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //🔽bslab par bgyi zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes par bgyi ba'o //
analyzed: 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang gang zhig yin zhe ni bsgrub par bya ba'o // bslab par bgyi zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes par bgyi ba'o //
translated: Here, who is the spiritual friend? It is to be accomplished.🔽One should train means one should thoroughly understand.

original: bstan par bgyi zhes bya ba ni yongs su mi gtong ba'o //
analyzed: bstan par bgyi zhes bya ba ni yongs su mi gtong ba'o //
translated: One should teach means one should not abandon.

original: bsnyen bkur bgyi zhes bya ba ni mnyes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsnyen bkur bgyi zhes bya ba ni mnyes par bya ba'o //
translated: “We will serve them” means we will please them.

original: gnas ce zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: gnas ce zhig bya zhe na /
translated: What should we do?

original: gang dag ces bya ba la la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: gang dag ces bya ba la la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: “Those who” and so on are stated.

original: 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang gang zhig nyin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang gang zhig nyin zhe na /
translated: Who are their spiritual friends?

original: de'i phyir de dag ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, “those” and so on are stated.

original: 'di la de dag ji ltar don lung 'bogs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di la de dag ji ltar don lung 'bogs pa yin zhe na /
translated: How do they teach the meaning of this [perfection of wisdom] to them?

original: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, “the meaning of the perfection of wisdom is like this” and so on is stated.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni rnam pa 'dis so //🔽rigs kyi bu tshur shog ces bya ba nas /
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni rnam pa 'dis so // rigs kyi bu tshur shog ces bya ba nas /
translated: “Like this” means in this way.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyis la 'dod par ma byed cig ces bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa la /🔽rnal 'byor ni rab tu sbyor ba'am /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyis la 'dod par ma byed cig ces bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa la / rnal 'byor ni rab tu sbyor ba'am /
translated: “Come here, son of a good family” and so on up to “do not long for the solitary realizers’ vehicle.”

original: mngon par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: mngon par sbyor ba'o //
translated: “Yoga” is application or engagement.

original: de la ma bsnyems shig ces bya ba ni de'i dngos po la ma 'dzin cig ces pa'o //
analyzed: de la ma bsnyems shig ces bya ba ni de'i dngos po la ma 'dzin cig ces pa'o //
translated: “Do not be conceited about that” means do not grasp its entity.

original: mi bsnyems pa ni chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: mi bsnyems pa ni chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: Non-conceit is the non-discrimination of all dharmas.

original: yongs su sbyangs pa ni goms pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su sbyangs pa ni goms pa'o //
translated: Cultivation is the repetition of that.

original: de ltar zhes bya @140b ba la sogs pas ni mjug bsdu pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya @140b ba la sogs pas ni mjug bsdu pa'o //
translated: Thus, etc., concludes the chapter.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba ni ro myang ba med pa ste 'di ni ro myang ba med pa'i khyad par gyis te lam gyi skad cig ma bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba ni ro myang ba med pa ste 'di ni ro myang ba med pa'i khyad par gyis te lam gyi skad cig ma bzhi pa'o //
translated: The dedication to perfect enlightenment is without relishing, and this is the fourth moment of the path, distinguished by the absence of relishing.

original: khyad par rnam pa bcu drug bstan nas byed pa rnam pa bcu bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: khyad par rnam pa bcu drug bstan nas byed pa rnam pa bcu bshad par bya ste /
translated: Having taught the sixteen kinds of distinction, the ten kinds of activity should be explained.

original: de la bstan bcos las /
analyzed: de la bstan bcos las /
translated: In this regard, the treatise states:🔽Beneficial, blissful, protective,🔽and a refuge for humans,

original: phan dang bde dang skyob pa dang // mi rnams kyi ni skyabs dag dang // gnas dang dpung gnyen gling dang ni //🔽yongs su 'dren pa zhes bya dang // lhun gyis grub dang theg gsum gyi //
analyzed: phan dang bde dang skyob pa dang // mi rnams kyi ni skyabs dag dang // gnas dang dpung gnyen gling dang ni // yongs su 'dren pa zhes bya dang // lhun gyis grub dang theg gsum gyi //
translated: a support, a companion, an island,🔽and a leader, spontaneous,

original: 'bras bu mngon sum mi byed dag //
analyzed: 'bras bu mngon sum mi byed dag //
translated: and not actualizing the fruits of the three vehicles,

original: tha ma rten gyi mdzad pa ste //
analyzed: tha ma rten gyi mdzad pa ste //
translated: the final activity is the support.

original: 'di ni byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin ;
analyzed: 'di ni byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin ;
translated: This is the characteristic of activity.

original: / zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: / zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir /🔽rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas dka' ba spyod pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rab 'byor gyis skabs ston par byed do //
analyzed: 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas dka' ba spyod pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rab 'byor gyis skabs ston par byed do //
translated: In order to demonstrate just this,🔽Subhūti said, “Bhagavan, if a Bodhisattva Mahāsattva who has newly generated the mind, after hearing this kind of Dharma, is not frightened, is not fearful, and does not become anxious, then, Bhagavan, that Bodhisattva Mahāsattva is practicing the perfection of wisdom.”🔽The Bhagavān said, “Subhūti, it is so!🔽It is so!🔽Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //🔽'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas 'gro ba lnga'i sems can rnams la yongs su grol bar bya ste /
analyzed: de de bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so // 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas 'gro ba lnga'i sems can rnams la yongs su grol bar bya ste /
translated: Subhūti, a Bodhisattva Mahāsattva who has newly generated the mind, after hearing this kind of Dharma, is not frightened, is not fearful, and does not become anxious.🔽Subhūti, that Bodhisattva Mahāsattva is practicing the perfection of wisdom.”🔽The Bhagavān having said that, the Venerable Subhūti said to him, “Bhagavan, if a Bodhisattva Mahāsattva who has newly generated the mind, after hearing this kind of Dharma, is not frightened, is not fearful, and does not become anxious, then, Bhagavan, that Bodhisattva Mahāsattva should be known as one who has been predicted to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening by the Tathāgatas, Arhats, Perfectly Awakened Ones of the past.🔽Bhagavan, that Bodhisattva Mahāsattva should be known as one who has been predicted to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening by the Tathāgatas, Arhats, Perfectly Awakened Ones of the present.🔽Bhagavan, that Bodhisattva Mahāsattva should be known as one who has been predicted to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening by the Tathāgatas, Arhats, Perfectly Awakened Ones of the future.🔽Bhagavan, that Bodhisattva Mahāsattva should be known as one who has been predicted to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening by the Tathāgatas, Arhats, Perfectly Awakened Ones of the present in the ten directions.

original: de dag 'jigs pa med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas par byed pa'i phyir te /🔽de ni de'i byed pa'o //
analyzed: de dag 'jigs pa med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas par byed pa'i phyir te /🔽de ni de'i byed pa'o //
translated: Bhagavan, that Bodhisattva Mahāsattva should be known as one who has been predicted to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening by the Tathāgatas, Arhats, Perfectly Awakened Ones of the past in the ten directions.🔽Bhagavan, that Bodhisattva Mahāsattva should be known as one who has been predicted to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening by the Tathāgatas, Arhats, Perfectly Awakened

original: 'jig rten la bde ba'i phyir dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las yongs su bkrol te de dag mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la gnas par byed pa de ni bde ba'i byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten la bde ba'i phyir dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las yongs su bkrol te de dag mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la gnas par byed pa de ni bde ba'i byed pa'o //
translated: For the happiness of the world, out of compassion for the world, means that the bodhisattva, having attained enlightenment, having become a perfect buddha, liberates beings from suffering, from mental unhappiness, and from perturbation, and he causes them to abide in the happiness of nirvana. This is the performance of happiness.

original: 'jig rten gyi skyob par gyur par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi skyob par gyur par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: He should become a protector for the world, etc.

original: skyob pa la sogs pa byed pa ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: skyob pa la sogs pa byed pa ni bstan pa'o //
translated: The performance of protection, etc. has been taught.

original: de lta bu'i ngo bo'i brtson 'grus rtsom mo zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i ngo bo'i brtson 'grus rtsom mo zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should apply the performance of protection, etc. to the striving for the essence of enlightenment.

original: ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du tshig rnam pa brgyad ji ltar bshad par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du tshig rnam pa brgyad ji ltar bshad par bya zhe na /
translated: How should one explain the eightfold statement as it has been taught?

original: de dag las zhas bya ba ni sdug bsngal de rnams las so ;
analyzed: de dag las zhas bya ba ni sdug bsngal de rnams las so ;
translated: From those means from those sufferings.

original: /'di zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten no //
analyzed: /'di zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten no //
translated: This means the world.

original: 'bad par zhes bya ba ni go cha gyon par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'bad par zhes bya ba ni go cha gyon par byed pa'o //
translated: “Endeavor” means donning the armor.

original: brtson 'grus ni rab tu sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus ni rab tu sbyor ba'o //
translated: “Exertion” means application.

original: skyob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni skyob par byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: skyob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni skyob par byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: “Will be a refuge” means that he will be a protector.

original: 'di ni skyob pa'i byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni skyob pa'i byed pa'o //
translated: This is the activity of a refuge.

original: skye ba la sogs pa nyid ni chos te /
analyzed: skye ba la sogs pa nyid ni chos te /
translated: “The Dharma” refers to birth, etc.

original: de dang ldan pas skye ba la sogs pa'i chos @141a * //
analyzed: de dang ldan pas skye ba la sogs pa'i chos @141a * //
translated: Since he possesses it, he is the one who has the Dharma of birth, etc.

original: can no // skyabs su 'gyur zhes bya ba ni skyabs kyi byed pa'o //🔽gang 'brel pa med pa ni sbyor ba med pa'o //
analyzed: can no // skyabs su 'gyur zhes bya ba ni skyabs kyi byed pa'o // gang 'brel pa med pa ni sbyor ba med pa'o //
translated: “Will be a refuge” means the activity of a refuge.🔽That which is not related is not connected.

original: gang sbyor ba med pa de ni 'brel pa med pa ste /
analyzed: gang sbyor ba med pa de ni 'brel pa med pa ste /
translated: That which is not connected is not related.

original: gnyi ga phan tshun tha mi dad par smras nas /
analyzed: gnyi ga phan tshun tha mi dad par smras nas /
translated: Having stated that the two are not mutually distinct,

original: 'brel pa med pa'i mtshan nyid skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa zhes gsungs te /🔽skye ba med pa ni dang po nyid nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i mtshan nyid skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa zhes gsungs te / skye ba med pa ni dang po nyid nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: he says that they are characterized by non-arising and non-cessation, which are not related.🔽Non-arising means that they are not produced from the beginning.

original: skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: Because they are not produced, they do not cease.

original: de bas skye ba dang 'gag pa med pas sbyor ba med do //
analyzed: de bas skye ba dang 'gag pa med pas sbyor ba med do //
translated: Therefore, since there is neither origination nor cessation, there is no application.

original: de dag 'brel pa med pa nyid de chos nyid tsam nyid kyi phyir ro zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: de dag 'brel pa med pa nyid de chos nyid tsam nyid kyi phyir ro zhes dgongs so //
translated: They are not related because they are mere reality itself.🔽Thus, one who sees consciousness would make application.

original: de ltar na shes pa mthong bas sbyor ba byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sbyor bas na sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar na shes pa mthong bas sbyor ba byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sbyor bas na sbyor ba'o //
translated: Since it is made to apply, it is application.

original: de'i phyir zhum par byed pas na gnas te ston par byed pa ni gnas su 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhum par byed pas na gnas te ston par byed pa ni gnas su 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, since it is made to abide, it is a basis.

original: 'di ni gnas kyi byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gnas kyi byed pa'o //
translated: This is the function of a basis.

original: gzugs kyi pha rol zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi pha rol zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi stong pa nyid do //
translated: The other side of form is the emptiness of form.

original: de ni gzugs ma yin zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni gzugs ma yin zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not form because of contradiction.

original: gzugs kyi pha rol ji lta ba zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi pha rol ji lta ba zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi stong pa nyid do //
translated: Just as the other side of form is the emptiness of form,🔽form is also like that.

original: gzugs kyang de bzhin te zhes bya ba ni de nyid gzugs kyi don dam pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyang de bzhin te zhes bya ba ni de nyid gzugs kyi don dam pa'o //
translated: Form is the ultimate of form.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa dang / chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa dang / chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no //
translated: Likewise, feeling, etc., and all dharmas are also like that.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: Subhūti said, Blessed One, if the perfection of wisdom is not a perfection, why is it called the perfection of wisdom?

original: gal te ji ltar chos thams cad kyi pha rol chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yin na de nyid shes nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te ji ltar chos thams cad kyi pha rol chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yin na de nyid shes nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur te /
translated: Subhūti said Blessed One, if all phenomena are the other shore of all phenomena, then by knowing that very [emptiness], the Bodhisattvas will attain perfect complete enlightenment.

original: chos nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the non-conceptuality of reality.

original: 'di yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi lan no //
analyzed: 'di yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi lan no //
translated: This is the Blessed One's reply, beginning with Subhūti, it is so.

original: de ltar na ji ltar shes par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na ji ltar shes par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it is asked How will they know?

original: de'i phyir de bzhin du bdag gis kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin du bdag gis kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said In the same way, I also...

original: rab 'byor de ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
translated: The conclusion is stated beginning with Subhūti, in that way...

original: dpung gnyen ni shes pa ste /
analyzed: dpung gnyen ni shes pa ste /
translated: The protector is the knowledge.

original: de nyid chos ston par byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid chos ston par byed pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is the teacher of the Dharma,

original: dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba ste 'di ni dpung gnyen gyi byed pa'o //
analyzed: dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba ste 'di ni dpung gnyen gyi byed pa'o //
translated: it becomes the protector. This is the function of the protector.

original: sngon gyi mtha' ni skye ba'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' ni skye ba'o //
translated: The prior limit is birth.

original: phyi ma'i mtha' ni 'gag pa'o //
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' ni 'gag pa'o //
translated: The future limit is cessation.

original: 'di dag yongs su chad pa ni chos thams cad yongs su spangs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di dag yongs su chad pa ni chos thams cad yongs su spangs pa ste /
translated: The complete severance of these is the complete abandonment of all phenomena,

original: don dam par chos nyid tsam nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam par chos nyid tsam nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because in the ultimate sense, they are mere reality.

original: gang gi phyir de dag gis de dag yongs su bcad pa 'di ni zhi ba ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de dag gis de dag yongs su bcad pa 'di ni zhi ba ste /
translated: The complete severance of these by those is peace,

original: sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because suffering is completely extinguished.

original: mi @141b gtsang ba dang 'brel pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir 'di ni gya nom pa'o //
analyzed: mi @141b gtsang ba dang 'brel pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir 'di ni gya nom pa'o //
translated: It is sublime because the connection with impurity is extinguished.

original: yang srid pa zad pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: yang srid pa zad pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: It is nirvana because of the exhaustion of rebirth.

original: don dam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir 'di ni ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: don dam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir 'di ni ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: It is the way things are because it is the ultimate.

original: phyin ci log med pa ni phyin ci ma log pa ste /
analyzed: phyin ci log med pa ni phyin ci ma log pa ste /
translated: It is non-inverted because it is free from error.

original: dmigs pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽de nyid gling dang chos mthun pa'i phyir gling ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro // de nyid gling dang chos mthun pa'i phyir gling ste /
translated: It is non-apprehension because it is non-objectification.🔽It is an island because it is similar to an island.

original: chos kyi dbyings ston par byed pas na gling ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ston par byed pas na gling ngo //
translated: It is an island because it reveals the dharma-dhātu.

original: 'di ni gling gi byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gling gi byed pa'o //
translated: This is the function of an island.

original: 'dir sgo nga'i phyi rol ma yin pa'i cha ni sbubs te 'dir gzhag par bya ba dang / spyad par bya ba'i gnas su byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir sgo nga'i phyi rol ma yin pa'i cha ni sbubs te 'dir gzhag par bya ba dang / spyad par bya ba'i gnas su byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the part that is not outside the eggshell is the membrane, because it is the place that is to be occupied and used.

original: de nyid ling tog ste mthong ba dang 'gal bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid ling tog ste mthong ba dang 'gal bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: That itself is the membrane, because it acts as an obstruction to seeing.

original: ma rig pa nyid sgo ba'i sbubs dang ling tog ste /
analyzed: ma rig pa nyid sgo ba'i sbubs dang ling tog ste /
translated: Ignorance itself is the membrane and the membrane.

original: des yongs su khebs pa ni g-yogs pa'o //
analyzed: des yongs su khebs pa ni g-yogs pa'o //
translated: Being completely covered by it is being veiled.

original: mun pa ni gti mug go //
analyzed: mun pa ni gti mug go //
translated: Darkness is delusion.

original: des zil gyis non pa ni log par byas pa'o //
analyzed: des zil gyis non pa ni log par byas pa'o //
translated: Being overcome by it is being perverted.

original: snang bar byed pa ni gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: snang bar byed pa ni gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: Illumination is making clear.

original: med par byed pa ni 'jig par byed pa'o //
analyzed: med par byed pa ni 'jig par byed pa'o //
translated: Destruction is annihilation.

original: de ltar snang bar byed pa'i phyir snang bar 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: de ltar snang bar byed pa'i phyir snang bar 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Thus, it is illumination because it makes illumination.

original: 'di ni snang ba'i byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni snang ba'i byed pa'o //
translated: This is the function of illumination.

original: skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa ni gcig tu bsdu ba'i zlas dbye ba'o //
analyzed: skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa ni gcig tu bsdu ba'i zlas dbye ba'o //
translated: Non-arising and non-cessation are distinguished by being combined into one.

original: rang bzhin ni chos thams cad kyi chos nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni chos thams cad kyi chos nyid do //
translated: Nature is the reality of all phenomena.

original: des de dag skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par rtogs pa'i don du chos ston bas na /
analyzed: des de dag skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par rtogs pa'i don du chos ston bas na /
translated: He teaches the Dharma for the sake of their understanding that those are not produced and do not cease.

original: yongs su 'dren pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su 'dren pa ste /
translated: He is the leader.

original: kun nas bla na med pa zhes bya ba'i don dam par rtogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: kun nas bla na med pa zhes bya ba'i don dam par rtogs par byed pa'o //
translated: He is the one who causes the understanding of the ultimate, which is called the unsurpassed.

original: 'di ni yongs su 'dren pa'o //🔽lhun gyis grub dang theg gsum gyis //
analyzed: 'di ni yongs su 'dren pa'o // lhun gyis grub dang theg gsum gyis //
translated: He is the leader.

original: 'bras bu mngon sum byed pa'i bdag //
analyzed: 'bras bu mngon sum byed pa'i bdag //
translated: He is the one who causes the realization of the result of the three vehicles spontaneously.

original: tha ma rten gyi mdzad pa ste //
analyzed: tha ma rten gyi mdzad pa ste //
translated: He is the one who causes the support.

original: zhes bya ba la theg pa gsum gyis lhun gyis grub pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byed pa ni rten gyi byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba la theg pa gsum gyis lhun gyis grub pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byed pa ni rten gyi byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: The spontaneous realization of the result of the three vehicles is called the activity of the support.

original: / gang gi phyir grong du 'gro ba phyin pa bzhin du lhun gyis grub pa'i 'gro bas theg pa gsum gyi 'bras bu yang thob par 'gro ba nyid do //🔽de yang lhun gyis grub pa yin te lus kyi gzugs kyis sam /
analyzed: / gang gi phyir grong du 'gro ba phyin pa bzhin du lhun gyis grub pa'i 'gro bas theg pa gsum gyi 'bras bu yang thob par 'gro ba nyid do // de yang lhun gyis grub pa yin te lus kyi gzugs kyis sam /
translated: Just as one who goes to a town arrives, in the same way, by means of spontaneous going, one arrives at the result of the three vehicles.🔽Moreover, that is spontaneous, not by going with the form of a body

original: sems kyis song nas de thob pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sems kyis song nas de thob pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: or by going with the mind.

original: 'on kyang lhun gyis grub pa kho nas so //
analyzed: 'on kyang lhun gyis grub pa kho nas so //
translated: But it is only spontaneous.

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i rten can te /🔽nam mkha' la ni 'ong ba 'am /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i rten can te / nam mkha' la ni 'ong ba 'am /
translated: Thus, all phenomena are based on space.

original: 'gro ba med de /
analyzed: 'gro ba med de /
translated: Space has no coming or going.

original: 'di ni rang gi ngo bo nyid kho nas gnas so //
analyzed: 'di ni rang gi ngo bo nyid kho nas gnas so //
translated: It abides only in its own nature.

original: de'i phyir nam mkha' rten can no //
analyzed: de'i phyir nam mkha' rten can no //
translated: Therefore, it is based on space.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ga las she na /
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ga las she na /
translated: From where is it equal to space?

original: ji ltar nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs te /🔽skye ba med pa nyid @142a * //
analyzed: ji ltar nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs te / skye ba med pa nyid @142a * //
translated: It is stated by “just as space” and so forth.

original: kyi phyir ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: kyi phyir ma byas pa'o //
translated: It is unmade because of non-arising.

original: gnas skabs gzhan du skye ba med pa'i phyir rnam par ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: gnas skabs gzhan du skye ba med pa'i phyir rnam par ma byas pa'o //
translated: It is unformed because of non-arising in another state.

original: rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pas ma byas pa ste mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pas ma byas pa ste mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o //
translated: It is unconditioned because it is not made by the assembly of causes and conditions.

original: gnas pa ni skye ba'i 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: gnas pa ni skye ba'i 'jug pa'o //
translated: Abiding is the engagement of arising.

original: yang dag par gnas pa ni kun nas gnas pas so //
analyzed: yang dag par gnas pa ni kun nas gnas pas so //
translated: Correct abiding is abiding all around.

original: rnam par gnas pa ni kha cig nyid du gnas pas so //
analyzed: rnam par gnas pa ni kha cig nyid du gnas pas so //
translated: Abiding in a certain way is abiding in a particular way.

original: 'di dag bzlog pa'i phyir mi gnas pa dang / yang dag par mi gnas pa dang / rnam par mi gnas pa dang / mkha' brtags pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa dang / lhun gyis grub pa ste /
analyzed: 'di dag bzlog pa'i phyir mi gnas pa dang / yang dag par mi gnas pa dang / rnam par mi gnas pa dang / mkha' brtags pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa dang / lhun gyis grub pa ste /
translated: In order to reverse these, there is non-abiding, non-perfect abiding, non-abiding in any way, and the designation of space.

original: chos rnams kyi chos nyid tsam nyid do zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi chos nyid tsam nyid do zhes dgongs so //
translated: The nature of phenomena is just that.

original: ji ltar nam mkha'i rten can yin pa de bzhin du stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i yang rten can dang de nyid 'gro ba'i rten can no //
analyzed: ji ltar nam mkha'i rten can yin pa de bzhin du stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i yang rten can dang de nyid 'gro ba'i rten can no //
translated: Just as it is based on space, it is also based on emptiness, etc. and is the basis of beings.

original: de ltar du bya dang mi dmigs dang // mngon par zhen pa bkag pa dang / rten gyi byed pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar du bya dang mi dmigs dang // mngon par zhen pa bkag pa dang / rten gyi byed pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is to be done, not to be observed, to stop clinging, and to be the basis.

original: byed pa rnam pa bcu bshad nas /
analyzed: byed pa rnam pa bcu bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the ten kinds of activity,

original: ngo bo nyid bshad par bya ste /🔽de'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las ;
analyzed: ngo bo nyid bshad par bya ste /🔽de'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las ;
translated: now the nature will be explained.🔽In this regard, the treatise states:

original: nyon mongs rtags dang mtshan ma dang // mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po dang // dben dang dka' dang nges pa dang // ched du bya dang mi dmigs dang // mngon par zhen pa bkag pa dang // dmigs pa zhes bya gang yin dang // mi mthun thogs pa med dang de //
analyzed: nyon mongs rtags dang mtshan ma dang // mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po dang // dben dang dka' dang nges pa dang // ched du bya dang mi dmigs dang // mngon par zhen pa bkag pa dang // dmigs pa zhes bya gang yin dang // mi mthun thogs pa med dang de //
translated: The cessation of clinging,🔽And what is called the objective support,🔽The adverse factors, the unobstructed,🔽And that which is without basis, without going, without arising,🔽And the non-apprehension of suchness—

original: gzhi med 'gro med skye med dang ; / de bzhin nyid ni mi dmigs dang // ngo bo nyid bcu drug bdag nyid //
analyzed: gzhi med 'gro med skye med dang ; / de bzhin nyid ni mi dmigs dang // ngo bo nyid bcu drug bdag nyid //
translated: This is the essence of the sixteen.
